descriptionHtml:
[size=2][font=Arial][size=4][b][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58536-1-1414398008.jpg[/img]

This MOD will replaced the face and body of the NPCs and followers.
[/b][/size][size=2]  All the replaced followers are Essential-ized and MaxLv is set to 100.
  (a Fort Dawnguard member is MaxLv 80, Not-Essential.)

[/size][color=#f4cccc][size=4][b]Character will be added sequentially in a future update !

[color=#e06666][size=5]Warning!!!![/size][/color]
[/b][size=2][color=#e06666] For installation of Aela.[/color]
[/size][color=#e06666][size=3][size=2]  > Aela, after "The Silver Hand" quest completed, please install using the option of a single installer.
  > The problem is that the facial expression of Aela does not change at all and when you enter the UnderForge is guaranteed to happen.
  > Please uninstall, when you have installed before the Qwest completion, and install again after "The Silver Hand" Qwest completion.
  > Before installing Aela, recommends backing up save data just to make sure. [/size]
[/size][/color][/size][/color]
[font=Arial][size=4][b][Character List(ver 0.60)]
[/b][/size][/font][b][font=Arial][size=2] for Vanilla NPCs
[/size][/font][/b][font=Arial][size=2] > Tullius
[/size][size=2] > Ulfric
[font=Arial][size=2] > Galmar[/size][/font]
[font=Arial][size=2] > Ralof[/size][/font]
[font=Arial][size=2] > Hadvar
 > Rikke

[/size][/font][/size][/font]   To prevent the bug Aela  facial expression becomes not change at all,
   Remove the replacement of Aera from the main file,
   prepared a single installer of Aela in options.

[font=Arial][size=4][b][Character List(ver 0.50)]
[/b][/size][/font][b][font=Arial][size=2] for Vanilla NPCs
[/size][/font][/b][font=Arial][size=2] > Jenassa
[/size][size=2] > Adrianne
[font=Arial][size=2] > Erik[/size][/font][/size][/font]

[b][font=Arial][size=4][Character List(ver 0.40)]
[/size][/font][/b][size=2][font=Arial][b] for Vanilla NPCs
[/b][/font][/size][font=Arial][size=2] > Irileth
[/size][size=2] > Balgruuf
[font=Arial][size=2] > Tonilia[/size][/font]
[font=Arial][size=2] > Arcadia[/size][/font]
[font=Arial][size=2] > Uthgerd
 > Proventus[/size][/font][/size][/font]

[font=Arial][size=4][b][Character List(ver 0.30)]
[/b][/size][/font][b][font=Arial][size=2] for Vanilla NPCs
[/size][/font][/b][font=Arial][size=2] > Karliah
[/size][size=2] > Bryjnolf
[font=Arial][size=2] > Delvin[/size][/font]
[font=Arial][size=2] > Vex[/size][/font]
[font=Arial][size=2] > Elisif[/size][/font][/size][/font]

[b][font=Arial][size=4][Character List(ver 0.20)]
[/size][/font][/b][size=2][font=Arial][b] for Vanilla NPCs[/b]
[/font][/size][font=Arial][size=2] > Aela
 > Farkas
 > Vilkas

[/size][/font][size=2][font=Arial][b] for DG NPCs[/b]
[/font][/size][font=Arial][size=2] > Agmaer[/size][/font]

[size=4][b][Character List(ver 0.10)][/b][/size]
[b] for Vanilla NPCs[/b]
 > Lydia
 > Jordis
 > Iona
 > Argis
 > Calder
 > Delphine

[b] for DG NPCs[/b]
 > Serana
 > Valerica


[/font]
[b][size=4][Requirements][/size][/b]
 > Skyrim Ver 1.9.32.0+
 > graphics settings Medium+ or
    Setting to "iTexMipMapSkip=0" in "SkyrimPrefs.ini"
    [color=#ff0000](In a Low setting, the texture of hair and eyes becomes an abnormal display. )[/color]


[b][size=4][Installation][/size][/b]
 > The installation of this MOD recommends NMM or Mod Organizer.
 > This MOD is being offered by the Fomod Installer.
    It can be chosen in ALL-In-One installation and separate installation.
    In addition, it is possible to select a body type UNP, CBBE, from seveNBase.
 > The vanilla NPC version can choose the Face type of Delphine's face.


[/size][size=2][b][size=4][Recommended Mods][/size][/b]
  [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?][size=2]Female Facial Animation[/size][/url][size=2] by nao4288  [color=#ff0000](This is very important!)[/color]
  [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?][size=2]Face Light[/size][/url][size=2] by tktk [color=#ff0000] ([/color][color=#ff0000]Strongly recommended!)[/color]

  I use The [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56020/?][size=2]AIR ENB[/size][/url][size=2] to take screenshots.


[size=4][b][Compatibility][/b][/size]
  This MOD will conflict with the MOD to change the face of followers and NPC.


[size=4][b][Credits][/b][/size]

author: pikona

files.name: GCE NPCs Replacer
files.changelogHtml:
(Vanilla Ver) unset Playable of Race and hair.
(DG ver) unset Playable of Race and hair.
(Vanilla Ver) Fix designation of body meshes of male characters.

files.name: GCE NPCs Replacer
files.changelogHtml:
(Vanilla Ver) add character. Irileth, Balgruuf, Tonilia, Arcadia, Uthgerd, Proventus
(Vanilla Ver) add UNPB(BBP) BodyType.

files.name: GCE NPCs Replacer
files.changelogHtml:
(Vanilla Ver) Tweak the Delphine, Aela, Elisif, Arcadia, Uthgerd.
(Vanilla Ver) Fix the eyes of Karliah.
(Vanilla Ver) add character. Jenassa, Adrianne, Erik.

files.name: GCE NPCs Replacer
files.changelogHtml:
(Vanilla Ver) To prevent the bug Aela facial expression becomes not change at all,
Remove the replacement of Aera from the main file,
prepared a single installer of Aela in options.

(Vanilla Ver) add character. Tullius, Ulfric, Galmar, Ralof, Hadvar, Rikke.

(Vanilla Ver) Adjust the size of height and head of each character.
